documentation.text:
DAO contract:
 1. Collects investors money (ether)
 2. Keep track of investor contributions with shares
 3. Allow investors to transfer shares
 4. allow investment proposals to be created and voted
 5. execute successful investment proposals (i.e send money)

userdoc.notice: DAO contract: 1. Collects investors money (ether) 2. Keep track of investor contributions with shares 3. Allow investors to transfer shares 4. allow investment proposals to be created and voted 5. execute successful investment proposals (i.e send money)
